trans-unit.source: Create a new Aspire integration template
trans-unit.target: Create a new Aspire integration template

trans-unit.source: Integration name must be a valid identifier with no spaces
trans-unit.target: Integration name must be a valid identifier with no spaces

trans-unit.source: Invalid template type '{0}'. Valid values: hosting, client, full
trans-unit.target: Invalid template type '{0}'. Valid values: hosting, client, full

trans-unit.source: Select the type of integration template to create
trans-unit.target: Select the type of integration template to create

trans-unit.source: Client Integration - Creates a client library template
trans-unit.target: Client Integration - Creates a client library template

trans-unit.source: Full Integration - Creates both hosting and client library templates
trans-unit.target: Full Integration - Creates both hosting and client library templates

trans-unit.source: Hosting Integration - Creates a hosting library template (Aspire.Hosting.*)
trans-unit.target: Hosting Integration - Creates a hosting library template (Aspire.Hosting.*)

trans-unit.source: Template type is required. Use: hosting, client, or full
trans-unit.target: Template type is required. Use: hosting, client, or full
